translation.en: -♪ It started with a bang… ♪ -Hey, I'll be back in one minute.
translation.vi: -♪ It started with a bang… ♪-Hey, I'll be back in one minute.

translation.en: If you're looking for the restroom, they're back towards the entrance hall.
translation.vi: If you're looking for the restroom,they're back towards the entrance hall.

translation.en: I think you should leave before I call security.
translation.vi: I think you should leavebefore I call security.

translation.en: When I saw you in the supermarket, I thought,
translation.vi: When I saw youin the supermarket, I thought,

translation.en: "Ah, it must be like a… trick of the light. Must be a mistake."
translation.vi: "Ah, it must be like a…trick of the light. Must be a mistake."

translation.en: I think you've mistaken me for someone else.
translation.vi: I think you've mistaken mefor someone else.

translation.en: -[woman] Look at me. -[Erin heaves]
translation.vi: -[woman] Look at me.-[Erin heaves]

translation.en: -But I know you have it. -No, I don't.
translation.vi: -But I know you have it.-No, I don't.

translation.en: I'm holding up fucking supermarkets. That's one step above purse snatching!
translation.vi: I'm holding up fucking supermarkets.That's one step above purse snatching!

translation.en: Just give it to me. Then I'm gone. No one else needs to know you're here.
translation.vi: Just give it to me. Then I'm gone.No one else needs to know you're here.

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah. Yeah. I want to believe that.
translation.vi: [chuckles] Yeah.Yeah. I want to believe that.

translation.en: I'm not going to hurt the kid, but I'll have to take her with me.
translation.vi: I'm not going to hurt the kid,but I'll have to take her with me.

translation.en: Otherwise, they won't believe me. I'm sorry.
translation.vi: Otherwise, they won't believe me.I'm sorry.

translation.en: -[grunts] -Ah!
translation.vi: -[grunts]-Ah!

translation.en: -[bones crunch] -Stay away from her!
translation.vi: -[bones crunch]-Stay away from her!

translation.en: We've got maybe 15 minutes to tidy up and get the fucking body out of here.
translation.vi: We've got maybe 15 minutes to tidy upand get the fucking body out of here.

translation.en: -It's faster if you help. -Okay.
translation.vi: -It's faster if you help.-Okay.

translation.en: -Do you want to say a few words? -What?
translation.vi: -Do you want to say a few words?-What?

translation.en: 'Cause you are the wife of my best friend.
translation.vi: 'Cause you are the wifeof my best friend.

translation.en: Mrs. Carter in the classroom with a dead body.
translation.vi: Mrs. Carter in the classroomwith a dead body.

translation.en: [woman] I'm getting a bad feeling about this.
translation.vi: [woman] I'm gettinga bad feeling about this.

translation.en: [Jordi] How about I cook and you flip, yeah?
translation.vi: [Jordi] How about I cookand you flip, yeah?

translation.en: -That's it. -[Harper chuckles]
translation.vi: -That's it.-[Harper chuckles]
